channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nurse Practitioners Critical in Treating Older Adults as Ranks of Geriatricians Shrink
item.description: The number of nurse practitioners specializing in geriatrics has more than tripled since 2010.

item.title: New Report: U.S. drug overdose deaths rise again after hopeful decline

item.title: Trump administration actions contradict MAHA rhetoric on toxic chemicals

item.title: Have Job-Based Health Coverage at 65? You May Still Want To Sign Up for Medicare

item.title: How Trump's travel ban could disrupt the way knowledge about health is shared
item.description: Global health specialists talk about the consequences of the full or partial ban on travel to the U.S. from 19 countries.

item.title: Listen to the Latest ‘KFF Health News Minute’
item.description: “Health Minute” brings original health care and health policy reporting from the KFF Health News newsroom to the airwaves each week.
